mean_cn: adj.反动的，反对变革的；  n.反动分子
mean_en: a person who is strongly opposed to new political or social ideas
sentence: Reactionary conservatives are extremely resistant to progressive political changes.
sentence_trans: 反动的保守主义者极其抗拒进步性的政治变革。
word_etyma: re回、向后 ＋ act行动，做 ＋ ion表示行为、行为的过程或结果、状态 ＋ ary有…性质的 → reactionary反动的，倒退的
